Room.Name: The Widow Maker Galley
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the galley of the pirate ship Widow Maker.
Room.LongDescription: The aroma from the boiling pots of various foods and soups is quite appealing. The galley is fairly busy as the cook and his assistance scurry to get dinner ready on time, or the captain will be quite upset. The last cook was literally thrown off the ship for not having dinner ready on time.
